statements: SELECT * FROM music_preferences;
SELECT favorite_genre, favorite_artist FROM music_preferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Rock';
SELECT favorite_artist, favorite_song FROM music_preferences WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT patient_id, favorite_genre, favorite_artist, favorite_song FROM music_preferences WHERE favorite_artist = 'Taylor Swift';
SELECT patient_id, favorite_genre, favorite_artist, favorite_song FROM music_preferences ORDER BY favorite_genre ASC, favorite_artist DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_preferences WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, favorite_genre FROM music_preferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_preferences WHERE favorite_artist LIKE '%Smith%' AND favorite_song IS NOT NULL;
SELECT favorite_song, favorite_genre FROM music_preferences WHERE favorite_genre IN ('Pop', 'R&B') ORDER BY favorite_song ASC;
SELECT patient_id, favorite_artist FROM music_preferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Jazz' AND favorite_artist != 'John Coltrane' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT playlist_name, patient_id FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id = 3;
SELECT playlist_id, COUNT(*) AS song_count FROM music_preferences GROUP BY playlist_id;
SELECT * FROM music_preferences WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY mood ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM music_preferences WHERE patient_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE playlist_name LIKE '%workout%';
SELECT * FROM music_preferences WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND mood = 'Happy';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(playlist_id) AS playlist_count FROM playlists GROUP BY patient_id HAVING playlist_count > 1;
SELECT playlist_name, mood, tempo FROM playlists JOIN music_preferences ON playlists.patient_id = music_preferences.patient_id WHERE playlists.patient_id = 2 AND genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM playlists
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name, creation_date FROM playlists
SELECT patient_id, playlist_name FROM playlists ORDER BY playlist_id DESC
SELECT * FROM music_preferences WHERE genre = 'Rock'
SELECT preference_id, artist, favorite_song FROM music_preferences
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT playlist_name, creation_date FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name, creation_date FROM playlists WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM music_preferences WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = 5 AND date_time < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT playlist_name, created_at FROM playlists WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM songs ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, genre FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Pop' OR genre = 'Rock';
SELECT playlist_name, therapist_name, session_date FROM playlists INNER JOIN therapy_sessions ON playlists.playlist_id = therapy_sessions.playlist_id;
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT playlist_name, created_at FROM playlists ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, genre FROM songs WHERE genre='Pop';
SELECT playlist_name, therapist_name FROM playlists p JOIN therapy_sessions s ON p.playlist_id = s.playlist_id;
SELECT playlist_name, created_at FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id IN (SELECT playlist_id FROM therapy_sessions);
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT playlist_name, creation_date FROM playlists WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT artist, genre FROM music_preferences ORDER BY genre ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT therapist_name, specialty, experience_years FROM therapists WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM playlists ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT playlist_name, patient_id FROM playlists WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT session_id, patient_id, therapist_id, duration FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_preferences WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND tempo = 'Fast';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, health_condition FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;
